lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif is in London preparing for the operation on Tuesday as he faces political pressure at home about his family’s wealth.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan Leader to Have Open-Heart Surgery
headline.main: Pakistan Leader Will Undergo Open-Heart Surgery for 2nd Time

snippet: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif is in London preparing for the operation on Tuesday as he faces political pressure at home about his family’s wealth.
abstract: Pakistani Prime Min Nawaz Sharif will undergo open-heart surgery in London, his second such surgery in five years.
